**NOTE** This is a WIP new version of **zio-aws** for ZIO 2. Documentation and migration guide is not ready yet. The old repository and documentation is still available at https://vigoo.github.io/zio-aws/docs/ and artifacts for the stable version are published in the `io.github.vigoo` organisation.
